meanings.definition: Plants that have external sources of nutrition
meanings.sent1: Exogens rely on outside nutrients to grow healthy.
meanings.sent2: The exogens in the garden need sunlight and water to thrive.
meanings.sent3: The exogens in the greenhouse threw a party for the other plants.
meanings.sent4: The exogens in the forest are like guests who bring their own food.
meanings.sent5: I remember exogens as plants that look outwards for their meals.

meanings.sent1: The exogens materials were imported from overseas.
meanings.sent2: Her success was due to her exogens efforts in networking.
meanings.sent3: The exogens idea of a flying car made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His exogens charm seemed to come from another world.
meanings.sent5: The exogens influence of the moon on the tides is fascinating.
